I help high-risk industries integrate AI systems safely, compliantly, and effectively. My expertise bridges **human factors** and **AI evaluation** in nuclear, insurance, telecom, defense, and other safety-critical sectors.

## Services {#services}

::: {.grid .grid-2}
### Human--AI Interaction Audits

Identify and address risks in AI-assisted decision-making environments.

### Compliance & Regulatory Support

Navigate EU AI Act, IEC, ISO, and sector-specific safety requirements.

### Usability & Workload Testing

Ensure operators can perform effectively and safely with AI tools.

### Training & Advisory

Equip engineers, operators, and regulators with human--AI safety best practices.
:::

## Experience {#experience}

> **Nuclear Control Room Optimization** -- Reduced predicted critical error risk by **25%** through targeted human--AI interaction redesign.

> **AI Compliance Testing** -- Developed testing framework for AI-assisted diagnostics aligned with draft EU AI Act standards.

> **Aerospace Safety Training** -- Delivered human--AI integration training to engineering teams in aerospace and energy sectors.
